thread.section_title: WesLend Financial Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WesLend Financial | www.weslend.com
thread.title: MATTHEW

author: MATTHEW
title: MATTHEW
text: I had used Weslend to re-finance a home 4 years ago and it was a seamless experience. Not this time. Communication from Weslend was terrible. Every single interaction was a struggle. I should have used Quicken Loans. We based our decision to use Weslend on our initial estimate from them. They used the wrong information to calculate our payments and after everything was said and done, our loan was almost $400 a month higher than the estimate. Totally unacceptable.
